statement.name: UPDATE_SMAAUL
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAAUL SET ACHAUL=?,AIRAUL=?,AREAUL=?,ATRAUL=?,BLKAUL=?,CLRAUL=?,NROAUL=?,CODCRS=?,CODSCH=?,LFTOBJ=?, LRGAUL=?,MAXAUL=?,MSAAUL=?,NOMAUL=?,NROCRS=?,NROSDE=?,PHTOBJ=?,PSOAUL=?,SLLAUL=?,SMTPSM=?,SQLBKR=?,STDAUL=?, TIPAUL=?,TOPOBJ=?,VLAAUL=?,VLMAUL=?,VLSAUL=?,VLVAUL=?,VTLAUL=? where codcia=? and codaul=? and codedf=?

statement.name: DELETE_SMAAUL
statement.sql: DELETE from SMAAUL WHERE CODCIA=? AND CODAUL=? AND NROSDE=? AND CODEDF=?
